price: Katakanlah, "Apa (azab) yang demikian itukah yang baik atau surga yang kekal yang telah dijanjikan kepada orang-orang yang bertakwa?" Dia menjadi balasan dan tempat kembali bagi mereka?"
arabic: قُلۡ أَذَٰلِكَ خَيۡرٌ أَمۡ جَنَّةُ ٱلۡخُلۡدِ ٱلَّتِي وُعِدَ ٱلۡمُتَّقُونَۚ كَانَتۡ لَهُمۡ جَزَآءٗ وَمَصِيرٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul adhālika khayrun am jannatu al-khul'di allatī wuʿida al-mutaqūna kānat lahum jazāan wamaṣīran
